title: Pulsefire Ezreal Summoner Icon
body: It appears its not showing up. Several people who have it, myself included, have noticed that its just a blank area.

replies.body:
That icon looks so outdated & simple..
OT , yea, I see it as well

+1 I'm also seeing it on the boards.

Are you referring to in game? I'm able to select it and have it be visible.
